question: Which one is a high yielding variety of rice?
explanation: Central Rice Research Institute has developed high yielding varieties of seeds i.e. CR Dhan 205, CR Dhan 306 and CRR 451. The Institute has added on 146 varieties of rice, since its establishment in 1946. IR 8, Jaya, Heera, VL Dhan 221, C ST 7-1, Jawahar, Vikas , Padma , kasturi, Pusa Basmati 1 are some high yeiding varieties of rice.
